ingredients.ingredient: 1 (0.53 ounce) package McCormick French Onion Dip Seasoning Mix

cookingTips: Mix all ingredients until well combined and smooth
Taste and adjust seasoning based on preference—add more seasoning if needed
Chill before serving for best flavor development
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple sauce combines just four ingredients. Comfortable with basic mixing and whisking?
